description:
I was never able to talk Chance into doing more full-on guy-on-guy work.
But he did say he had fun doing the Serviced video and wanted to do more work that wasn't so interactive.
So I thought I would get him in for an Edge video, which were basically designed to ease the straight guys into doing 'more'. Pushing their limits so they can see they can in fact do more with a dude than get his dick sucked.
Of course, I would run into guys that had no limits (Teague comes to mind!), but over all, most of the guys really stick to a very narrow range of things they will do.
Chance is one for those guys, so if you watch the fantasy stuff, just know, I am really pushing him out of his comfort zone.
Some pretty hot dominate stuff going on, so hopefully you can all appreciate it!
title: Bryan & Chance - Edge
